snippet: Andy Murray powered his way to a third Shanghai Masters title by beating Spanish 15th seed Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6(1) 6-1 in Sunday's final to close in on Novak Djokovic at the top of the world rankings....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray powered his way to a third Shanghai Masters title by beating Spanish 15th seed Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6(1) 6-1 in Sunday's final to close in on Novak Djokovic at the top of the world rankings.

headline.print_headline: Murray Beats Bautista Agut to Win Third Shanghai Masters Title
headline.main: Murray Beats Bautista Agut to Win Third Shanghai Masters Title
